translation.Title: Login to continue
translation.Username or Email Desc: A username or email must be provided.
translation.Password Characters Min: Your new password should be at least 8 characters in length.
translation.Password Not Match: Your new password does not match.
translation.Account Email: Enter your account email address to receive instructions on resetting your password.
translation.Valid Email: A valid email address must be provided to continue.
translation.Enter Two-Factor: Enter one of the recovery codes generated when you setup 2-Factor authentication on this account in order to continue.
translation.Enter Two-Factor 2: Enter the two-factor token generated by your device.
translation.Two-factor Desc: Two-factor authentication is currently enabled on your account.
translation.Two-factor e Desc: You do not currently have two-factor authentication enabled on your account. Click the button below to begin configuring it.
translation.Provide Current Password: You must provide your current password in order to continue.
translation.Provide Authentication Code: You must provide an authentication code to continue.
translation.Password Caracters: Passwords must be at least 8 characters in length.
translation.Description API: A description of this API key.
translation.Description API Required Characters: Description must be at least 4 characters
translation.Leave blank IP: Leave blank to allow any IP address to use this API key, otherwise provide each IP address on a new line.
translation.Confirm Password TW: In order to disable two-factor authentication you will need to provide your account password.
translation.Provide Current Password Email: You must provide your current account password.
translation.Provide Current Password Pass: You must provide your current password.
translation.Password Not Match Pass: Password confirmation does not match the password you entered.
translation.Email Updated: Your primary email has been updated.
translation.Two-factor Enabled Description: Two-factor authentication has been enabled on your account. Should you lose access to your authenticator device you ll need to use one of the codes displayed below in order to access your account.
translation.Not Display Again: These codes will not be displayed again.
translation.Two-factor Info: Please take note of them now by storing them in a secure repository such as a password manager.
translation.Authenticator Code: Enter the code from your authenticator device after scanning the QR image.
translation.Alternative Token: Alternatively, enter the following token into your authenticator application:
translation.Exclusive Password: Your new password should be at least 8 characters in length and unique to this website.
translation.Identify Server: Enter a server name, uuid, or allocation to begin searching.
translation.Confirm API key delete: Are you sure you wish to delete this API key? All requests using it will immediately be invalidated and will fail.
translation.No API Keys: No API keys exist for this account.
translation.Two-factor Required: Your account must have two-factor authentication enabled in order to continue.
translation.Show API Key: The API key you have requested is shown below. Please store this in a safe location, it will not be shown again.
translation.There are no other servers to display: There are no other servers to display.
translation.There are no servers associated with you: There are no servers associated with your account
translation.Error Rendering View: An error was encountered by the application while rendering this view. Try refreshing the page.
translation.Server Installing: This server is currently running its installation process and most actions are unavailable.
translation.Server Transferring: This server is currently being transferred to another node and all actions are unavailable.
translation.Websocket Error: There was an error validating the credentials provided for the websocket. Please refresh the page.
translation.Connect Server Error: Were having some trouble connecting to your server, please wait...
translation.No Backups To Display: Looks like weve run out of backups to show you, try going back a page.
translation.No Backups: It looks like there are no backups currently stored for this server.
translation.Backups 0: Backups cannot be created for this server because the backup limit is set to 0.
translation.Backups Created: backups have been created for this server.
translation.Confirmation Unlock Backup: Are you sure you want to unlock this backup? It will no longer be protected from automated or accidental deletions.
translation.Stop Server: This server will be stopped in order to restore the backup. Once the backup has started you will not be able to control the server power state, access the file manager, or create additional backups until it has completed.
translation.Confirmation Stop Server: Are you sure you want to continue?
translation.Remove All Files: Remove all files and folders before restoring this backup.
translation.Delete Backup Confirmation: Are you sure you wish to delete this backup? This is a permanent operation and the backup cannot be recovered once deleted.
translation.Backup Name Desc: If provided, the name that should be used to reference this backup.
translation.Ignore Files Desc: Enter the files or folders to ignore while generating this backup. Leave blank to use the contents of the .pteroignore file in the root of the server directory if present. Wildcard matching of files and folders is supported in addition to negating a rule by prefixing the path with an exclamation point.
translation.Prevents Backup: Prevents this backup from being deleted until explicitly unlocked.
translation.Database Name Required: A database name must be provided.
translation.Database Name Characters: Database name must be at least 3 characters.
translation.Database Name Characters Max: Database name must not exceed 48 characters.
translation.Database Name Rules: Database name should only contain alphanumeric characters, underscores, dashes, and/or periods.
translation.Database Value: A connection value must be provided.
translation.Database Address: A valid connection address must be provided.
translation.Database Desc: A descriptive name for your database instance.
translation.Database Connection Desc: Where connections should be allowed from. Use % for wildcards.
translation.Database Name Provided: The database name must be provided.
translation.Database Deletion Desc 1: Deleting a database is a permanent action, it cannot be undone. This will permanetly delete the
translation.Database Deletion Desc 2: database and remove all associated data.
translation.Database Confirm Name Desc: Enter the database name to confirm deletion.
translation.No Databases: It looks like you have no databases.
translation.Database Creation Locked: Databases cannot be created for this server.
translation.Databases Allocated: databases have been allocated to this server.
translation.Eula Invalid Java: Invalid Java version, update Docker image?
translation.Eula Java Version Error: This server is unable to start due to the required Java version not being met.
translation.Eula Desc 2: below you are acknowledging that the Docker image this server uses will be changed to an image below that has the Java version you are requesting.
translation.Eula Select Java: Please select a Java version from the list below.
translation.Eula Accept Desc 1: below you are indicating your agreement to the
translation.Files Deletion Confirmation Desc: Deleting files is a permanent operation, you cannot undo this action.
translation.Files PteroIgnore Message 2: file. Any files or directories listed in here will be excluded from backups. Wildcards are supported by using an asterisk
translation.Files PteroIgnore Message 3: You can negate a prior rule by prepending an exclamation point
translation.File Manager Directory Empty: This directory seems to be empty.
translation.File Manager Directory Large: This directory is too large to display in the browser, limiting the output to the first 250 files.
translation.File Manager Create File Desc: Enter the name that this file should be saved as.
translation.File Manager Confirmation Delete Files 1: Are you sure you want to delete
translation.File Manager Confirmation Delete Files D: Deleting the file(s) listed below is a permanent operation, you cannot undo this action.
translation.File Manager Create Directory Desc: This directory will be created as
translation.File Manager Create Directory Info: A valid directory name must be provided.
translation.File Manager Move Files Desc: Enter the new name and directory of this file or folder, relative to the current directory.
translation.File Manager Drop Files: Drag and drop files to upload.
translation.Network Delete Alocation Confirm: This allocation will be immediately removed from your server. Are you sure you want to continue?
translation.Schedule Delete Confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this schedule? All tasks will be removed and any running processes will be terminated.
translation.Schedule Desc: A human readable identifer for this schedule.
translation.Schedule Description: The schedule system supports the use of Cronjob syntax when defining when tasks should begin running. Use the fields above to specify when these tasks should begin running.
translation.Schedule Option 1 Desc: Only execute this schedule when the server is in a running state.
translation.Schedule Option 2 Desc: This schedule will be executed automatically if enabled.
translation.Schedule No Configured: There are no schedules configured for this server.
translation.Schedule Delete Task Desc: Are you sure you want to delete this task? This action cannot be undone.
translation.Schedule Create Backup Error: A backup task cannot be created when the servers backup limit is set to 0.
translation.Schedule Edit Task Warning: A task payload must be provided.
translation.Schedule Warning Message 1: The time offset must be a valid number between 0 and 900.
translation.Schedule Warning Message 2: A time offset value must be provided.
translation.Schedule Warning Message 3: The time offset must be at least 0 seconds.
translation.Schedule Warning Message 4: The time offset must be less than 900 seconds.
translation.Schedule Time Desc: The amount of time to wait after the previous task executes before running this one. If this is the first task on a schedule this will not be applied.
translation.Schedule Files Desc: Optional. Include the files and folders to be excluded in this backup. By default, the contents of your .pteroignore file will be used. If you have reached your backup limit, the oldest backup will be rotated.
translation.Schedule Failure Button Desc: Future tasks will be run when this task fails.
translation.Settings Reinstall Server Desc: Your server will be stopped and some files may be deleted or modified during this process, are you sure you wish to continue?
translation.Settings Reinstall Desc 1: Reinstalling your server will stop it, and then re-run the installation script that initially set it up.
translation.Settings Reinstall Desc 2: Some files may be deleted or modified during this process, please back up your data before continuing.
translation.Settings SFTP Desc: Your SFTP password is the same as the password you use to access this panel.
translation.Startup Docker Title: This is an advanced feature allowing you to select a Docker image to use when running this server instance.
translation.Startup Docker Change Blocked 2: Docker image has been manually set by an administrator and cannot be changed through this UI.
translation.Users Email Max Characters: Email addresses must not exceed 191 characters.
translation.Users Valid Email: A valid email address must be provided.
translation.Users Permitions Sub User: Only permissions which your account is currently assigned may be selected when creating or modifying other users.
translation.Users Create Sub User Desc: Enter the email address of the user you wish to invite as a subuser for this server.
translation.Users Deletion Sub User Desc: Are you sure you wish to remove this subuser? They will have all access to this server revoked immediately.
translation.Users Empty Message: It looks like you dont have any subusers.
translation.Routers Server Installer Desc: Your server should be ready soon, please try again in a few minutes.
translation.Routers Server Suspended Desc: This server is suspended and cannot be accessed.
translation.Routers Server Transferring Desc: Your server is being transfered to a new node, please check back later.
translation.Routers Server Restoring Desc: Your server is currently being restored from a backup, please check back in a few minutes.
translation.Hoc Access Desc: You do not have permission to access this page.
